objectId.userHelpText: Object identifier (ID) of the user object in Azure AD.

tenantId.userHelpText: Tenant identifier (ID) of the user object in Azure AD.

accountEnabled.userHelpText: Specifies whether your account is enabled.
accountEnabled.adminHelpText: Specifies whether the user's account is enabled.

passwordPolicies.userHelpText: Password policies used by Azure AD to determine password strength, expiry etc.

email.userHelpText: Email address that can be used to contact you.

otherMails.userHelpText: Email addresses that can be used to contact the user.

userPrincipalName.userHelpText: Your user name as stored in the Azure Active Directory.

upnUserName.userHelpText: The user name for creating user principal name.

executedSelfAssertedInput.userHelpText: A claim that specifies whether attributes were collected from the user.

authenticationSource.userHelpText: Specifies whether the user was authenticated at Social IDP or local account.

nca.userHelpText: Special parameter passed for local account authentication to login.microsoftonline.com.

grant_type.userHelpText: Special parameter passed for local account authentication to login.microsoftonline.com.

scope.userHelpText: Special parameter passed for local account authentication to login.microsoftonline.com.

objectIdFromSession.userHelpText: Parameter provided by the default session management provider to indicate that the object id has been retrieved from an SSO session.

isActiveMFASession.userHelpText: Parameter provided by the MFA session management to indicate that the user has an active MFA session.

givenName.userHelpText: Your given name (also known as first name).

surname.userHelpText: Your surname (also known as family name or last name).
